Class AddProductScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.software_1_project.AddProductScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This controls the Add Product screen.
